amendment.description: Amendment deletes language that prohibits funds from being used to carry out a Colonias initiative without the prior approval of the Committee on Appropriations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 62 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the bill's provision that prohibits the use of funds for a "Colonias initiative" which is a program designed to improve the living standards of "colonias"--severely impoverished U.S. communities along the southwest border with Mexico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reyes amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
